ChronosFall.title: Chronos Fall
content:
In the near future, most of the world has collapsed due to a sudden occurrence of
"space-time collapse". However, some areas miraculously survived the collapse and continue to exist as "time fault zones". There, the surviving humanity quietly lives their lives.

As the protagonist of "STPS", a public security force established in the time fault zones, pursue the mystery of the space-time collapse and aim for a reunion with your brother who was lost several years ago.

TechnifterPartners.title: Technifter Partners
content: Adds electrically-powered machines called Technifters to Minecraft, allowing you to sweep away enemies and more (details TBD)
